comments.body: Use an instance method instead of an auto-bound function. The `Model` class is used heavily in the Game Server, and auto-binding this debug function for each model instance is unnecessary performance overhead, as described in [Perf in GS Internals](https://www.notion.so/gathertown/Perf-in-GS-Internals-19fbc7eac3d1802dbf0ecd39a2c245ee?#19fbc7eac3d18073a509e06aebaffa1c)
